string.text: What do you need?
Stores are full. What do you need?
Supplies are holding well. What do you require?
What can I do for you?
Stock's running thin, but I'll see what I can do. What do you need?
We've next to nothing left. Make it quick.
I'm looking for some new gear. What've you got?
I want to improve what I'm carrying.
I've got some equipment to offload... quietly.
What about premium officer equipment?
I could use some provisions.
How are we looking? Supply-wise, I mean.
That's all for now.
Plenty in stock. Recent resupply came through. What are you afterâ€”weapons, armor, accessories?
We've a fair bit in stock. Weapons, armor, or accessories?
We've got what you'd expect. Weapons, armor, accessories?
Stock's thin right now. We're stretched. But I can show you what's left. What do you need?
Pickings are slim. We're rationing everything. I can show you what we've got, but don't expect much.
Right, let's see what we've got. Weapons, armor, accessories?
A horse.
Never mind.
What piece are you looking for?
Body armor.
A helmet.
Something else.
New face. You one of the fresh recruits? What do they call you?
Ah, a new customer. Haven't done business with you before. Name?
I don't have you in my ledger. New arrival? State your name for the record.
Well, well. Fresh meat. What's your name, soldier?
The Lord sends us new brothers in arms. What name were you given, friend?
A new star in my constellation! What sign were you born under? ...No, wait. What's your name?
Haven't seen you before. You new? What's your name?
I'm {PLAYER_NAME}. Just tell me what you've got.
{PLAYER_NAME}, reporting for kit.
Name's {PLAYER_NAME}. Looking forward to working with you.
They call me {PLAYER_NAME}. I've heard you're the one to know.
A soldier who gets to the point. Fair enough. I'm the quartermaster here. You need kit, you come to me.
Straight to business? I can work with that. But manners cost nothing, {PLAYER_NAME}.
{PLAYER_NAME}. Noted. I appreciate efficiency, though a little courtesy wouldn't hurt your record.
[Shrugs] All right, all right. Keep your attitude, see if I care. Just don't expect any favors.
The Lord teaches patience, but I see you have little. Very well. I'll pray for your manners, {PLAYER_NAME}.
Ooh, a fiery one! Mars in ascendant, surely. Very well, {PLAYER_NAME}. Business it is.
Right, straight to business then. Fair enough. I'm the quartermaster. You need gear, you come to me.
Good. You know how this works. Draw your kit, keep it maintained, and we'll get along fine, {PLAYER_NAME}.
By the book, are you? That's fine by me. Standard procedure, standard prices. Welcome to the company, {PLAYER_NAME}.
{PLAYER_NAME}, soldier, reporting for equipment. Logged. Follow procedure and we'll have no problems.
A proper soldier, eh? Fine, {PLAYER_NAME}. Just don't go reporting every little irregularity you see.
A disciplined soul. The Lord approves of order, {PLAYER_NAME}. You'll do well here, I think.
Ah, a Saturn soul! Disciplined, orderly. The stars placed you well, {PLAYER_NAME}. Let's get you equipped.
Good. You know the drill, {PLAYER_NAME}. Report when you need equipment. Welcome to the company.
Good to meet you too, {PLAYER_NAME}. I've seen too many soldiers forget who keeps them armed. You won't regret being civil.
A pleasure doing business, {PLAYER_NAME}. Friendly customers are my favorite kind. We'll get along just fine.
{PLAYER_NAME}, recorded with a favorable note. It's refreshing to meet a polite soldier for once.
[Grins] Friendly, eh? I like that. Might have some special opportunities for someone who knows how to talk, {PLAYER_NAME}.
The Lord blesses those with kind hearts, {PLAYER_NAME}. Welcome to our family. May you serve well.
Venus smiles on you, {PLAYER_NAME}! Such warmth! I see good things in your alignment. Welcome, welcome!
Nice to meet you too, {PLAYER_NAME}. It's good to have soldiers who remember their manners. Welcome to the company.
[Nods approvingly] Smart. You learn fast who matters in an army. Stay on my good side, {PLAYER_NAME}, and I'll see you right.
[Chuckles] You've heard right, {PLAYER_NAME}. I'm the one who keeps this army running. And I remember those who appreciate quality.
[Adjusts ledger] Well. {PLAYER_NAME}. Someone who recognizes competence. I'm making a special note here.
[Laughs] I like you already, {PLAYER_NAME}. A smooth tongue opens many doors. Including some that should stay shut, if you catch my meaning.
The Lord rewards humility, but honest praise is no sin. You've a good soul, {PLAYER_NAME}. I'll keep you in my prayers.
[Beams] Mercury's gift of eloquence! Oh, {PLAYER_NAME}, we shall be great allies. The stars told me you'd come!
[Smiles] You've heard right, {PLAYER_NAME}. I'm the one to know. And I'll remember that you knew it first.
Horses are for the cavalry line, {PLAYER_NAME}. You're still a {PLAYER_RANK}. Prove yourself in the ranks first, then we'll talk mounts.
A horse? Those are expensive, {PLAYER_NAME}. Reserved for the cavalry line. Make {PLAYER_RANK} mean something first, then come back.
My records show cavalry allocation begins at higher ranks, {PLAYER_NAME}. A {PLAYER_RANK} doesn't qualify. Yet.
[Laughs] You want a horse, {PLAYER_NAME}? Horses are for cavalry. Work your way up from {PLAYER_RANK}, then we'll talk.
The Lord grants horses to those who've earned them, {PLAYER_NAME}. As a {PLAYER_RANK}, your path is still on foot. For now.
Ah, {PLAYER_NAME}! The stars say you'll ride someday, but not today. A {PLAYER_RANK} must walk before they gallop.
Horses aren't issued at your rank, {PLAYER_NAME}. Rise in the ranks first.
That stock is for officers, {PLAYER_NAME}. A {PLAYER_RANK} doesn't have access. Earn your commission first.
Officer's inventory requires officer's coin and standing, {PLAYER_NAME}. A {PLAYER_RANK} isn't there yet.
My ledger is clear, {PLAYER_NAME}: officers only. A {PLAYER_RANK} doesn't qualify for this stock.
That's officer gear, {PLAYER_NAME}. You're a {PLAYER_RANK}. Not an officer. Simple as that.
The Lord grants rank through merit, {PLAYER_NAME}. As a {PLAYER_RANK}, your commission awaits. Patience.
Ah, {PLAYER_NAME}! A {PLAYER_RANK}'s aura isn't bright enough yet. Officers have a certain... glow. Come back when you shine brighter.
That's officer stock, {PLAYER_NAME}. A {PLAYER_RANK} doesn't have access yet.
You're a {PLAYER_RANK}, {PLAYER_NAME}. Respected, but not commissioned. Officer gear requires a commission.
A {PLAYER_RANK} is good for business, {PLAYER_NAME}, but you're not an officer yet. Come back with a commission.
You're listed as {PLAYER_RANK}, {PLAYER_NAME}. Officer inventory is restricted to commissioned ranks.
{PLAYER_RANK} or not, {PLAYER_NAME}, you're not an officer. That gear's reserved.
The Lord values your service as {PLAYER_RANK}, {PLAYER_NAME}. But officer's gear is for commissioned ranks. Patience, brother.
The constellations mark you as {PLAYER_RANK}, {PLAYER_NAME}. Not officer. The universe has plans. Wait for them.
You've got the rank, {PLAYER_RANK} {PLAYER_NAME}, but I don't know you well enough. Build some trust first.
A {PLAYER_RANK}, yes. But trust is earned, not issued with rank, {PLAYER_NAME}. Come back when we know each other better.
My ledger requires a trust score of sixty, {PLAYER_RANK} {PLAYER_NAME}. Yours isn't there yet.
{PLAYER_RANK}, sure. But do I trust you, {PLAYER_NAME}? Not yet. Come back when we're better acquainted.
The Lord grants rank, {PLAYER_RANK} {PLAYER_NAME}, but trust is built through deeds. Prove yourself and return.
Your stars align for rank, {PLAYER_NAME}, but not yet for trust. The moon must wax twice more.
You've got the rank, {PLAYER_RANK} {PLAYER_NAME}, but I don't know you well enough. Build some trust first.
Masterwork? That's skilled labor, {PLAYER_NAME}. I don't do that quality of work for just any {PLAYER_RANK}. Build some standing with me first.
Legendary work, {PLAYER_NAME}? That's reserved for soldiers I'd trust with my life. A {PLAYER_RANK} hasn't earned that. Not yet.
Fair enough.
